body.name: ARFUEE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 500W/40KPA/60Mins Runtime Vacuum Cleaners for Home, LED Display, 1.5L Cup, Lightweight, Ultra-Quiet, Cordless Stick Vacuum for Carpet/Hard Floor/Car/Pet
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 23 hrs 3 mins
features: 【 500W & 40000Pa Powerful Suction 】- ARFUEE P10 cordless vacuum cleaner built-in 2024 latest upgraded 500W high power motor for which maximum mode can reach to 40KPa suction power, instantly suck away dirt, debris, pet hair and stains, easy to clean hard floors, tile, carpets.

【 60 Mins of Run Time/ 4H Charge 】- Stick vacuum built-in high power battery, delivers up to 20(Max mode)-60(Eco mode) minutes uninterrupted run time depending on your mode, ideal for for large-home deep cleans without cord. The rechargeable battery only takes 4 hours to fully charge. You can purchase extra batteries to get a longer run time.

【All-in-ONE LED Display &1.5L Dust Cup】- Vacuum has large smart LED display screen, you can effortlessly get the current status of your vacuum cleaner. It shows real-time suction mode, remaining battery value,d floor brush blockage reminder. with a big capacity of 1.5L dust cup, and the box can be easily emptied with the push of a button.

【Lightweight for Quick, Versatile, Multiscene Cleaning】- The main body of the cordless vacuum is super lightweight at only 2.7lbs, more lighter, ergonomically designed for ease of use. perfect for one-handed cleaning, not make your hands feel tired even if you use it for a long time. The wall mount design making it easily to be stored and charged without taking up any space.

【Advanced 5-layer HEPA Filtration System】- P10 Cordless vacuum features5-layer HEPA Filtration which can captures 99.99% of of particles expels cleaner air. It's so safe and friendly to families with babies, elders, and special-care members.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Hard to Reach Nooks and Crannies
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with this cordless vacuum. It is perfect for cleaning baseboards and inside drawers. Practically weightless in the hand. There are two speeds, low and high. The unit comes apart to empty the dust cup and clean the filter. No electric cord. Just charge it with a USB! And a happy surprise - there is an attachment that fits on the bottom that blows air out. Perfect for cleaning a keyboard!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great little portable vacuum! I was really surprised by the suction. Picks up a lot of stuff! Has 2 modes and both work great. Higher mode really works well. Great little tool for getting the crumbs from car seats and crevices and the attachments make it easy to reach tight spaces. Easy to open and empty! Charging is fast and easy and lasts a long time! Highly recommend for a handheld portable vac!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting, light, and strong .
reviews.reviewText: This bad boy packs a crazy strong 40000Pa suction power. It works very well on sucking up dirt, pet hair, and stains like nobody's business, whether it's on hardwood, tile, or carpet. I have tried them all.The price range seems to be competitive, and you can't go wrong with this reliable device.What's really cool is its battery life – you can clean for up to 60 minutes in Eco mode before it needs a juice-up, and it only takes 4 hours to get it back to full power. It's really convenient and I'll never go back to those bulky and heavy conventional designs.The LED display has a neat touch, keeping you in the loop on suction mode and battery life, so you're never left hanging mid-clean. Plus, the dust cup is a good size, so you won't be constantly running back and forth to empty it, and it's super easy to do with just the press of a button.This vacuum is lightweight and easy to handle, even if you're just using one hand. And when you're done, you can pop it on the wall mount to keep it out of the way. Oh, and let's not forget about safety :*) the P10's HEPA filtration system makes sure the air in your home stays clean and fresh, which is perfect if you've got allergies or little ones running around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, super convenient!
reviews.reviewText: It's tempting to write something like "this vacuum cleaner sucks" but that's what it's supposed to do! It picks up dirt and dust perfectly well. The battery lasts a long time. And it's very lightweight and compact so easy to handle and store. The couple of attachments that come with it are useful and fit well. I'm very glad I got this and find myself using it all the time for all of those little spills and dust bunnies that turn up all too often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this little vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this handheld vacuum to clean edges that my robot vacuum misses, but it's so handy I've been using it for much more. It's great to clean my car, under my couch cushions and for those little messes that aren't worth dragging out my regular vacuum.It's easy to charge using a USB cord that is included. It's very compact and it fits nicely in my hand unlike my old clunky handheld vacuum. Easy to store as well because of its compact size!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this little vacuum! It is great for the small odd jobs around your house. It charged in a few hours and the first thing that needed vacuuming was the filter on my dehumidifier. It worked great and with the clear dust cup I could see what it picked up. Next was fluff from the bottom of my washing machine…see odd jobs! It is small and powerful enough to get the job done instantly. It has attachments to get in small corners and for fabric. It is described as a car vacuum and I was able to get the crumbs between my seats and in cup holders with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very efficient vacuum
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum does the job fantastic well with a good suction power , good for the car , couch , able to access small crevices ! I keep it in my car , stays charged long , it helps a lot with keeping my car clean all the time of the dog hair and dust :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little vaccuum
reviews.reviewText: This hand held vacuum is really easy to use and charge. It doesn’t have a ton of suction power, but with it being so small and lightweight it’s really convenient to use in the car and house nooks. Charges quick and easy to clean/change the filter.
